column3:
Eshana seems unusually skittish.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Search the designated locations, subdue impure bhoots, then purify your targets using sanctified saltwater.
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, you could not have come at a better time! We have need of a champion─a brave hero who ssstands firm in the face of faceless horror!
There have been reportsss of bhootsss, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, and my sssisters at Vira Nilya have tasssked usss with exorcising these ragged ssspecters.
Here. Make your way to the Ssstriped Hills. Sssubdue any bhootsss you encounter, then douse them with this sssanctified sssaltwater. Be thorough.
...Are they gone? You didn't...touch them, did you?
Ananta legend has it that those who ssso much as brush the rags of a bhoot will be cursssed. Your hair will melt away, your ssscales rot, and your eyes fade to a milky white...
For we who cherish beauty above all elssse, the very thought of sssuch pessstilent phantoms is nauseating. I truly appreciate you carrying out this dissstasteful tasssk on our behalf.
